pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: American Heritage Center, University of Wyoming
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Collection documents Kuhn's career as a radio war correspondent for NBC, 1940-1949, and contains papers and sound recordings, including her broadcasts of the liberation of Shanghai and Manila in 1945 and The Kuhns broadcasts she did with her daughter Rene. Papers include financial records, legal files, news releases, newspaper clippings, photographs, subject files, awards, biographic information and miscellaneous other materials.
